item.title: Empty Column Misinitialization
item.description: When a new empty column is needed in a DataFrame in Pandas, use the NaN value in Numpy instead of using zeros or empty strings.

item.title: Pytorch Call Method Misused
item.description: Use self.net() in PyTorch to forward the input to the network instead of self.net.forward().

item.title: Threshold-Dependent Validation
item.description: Use threshold-independent metrics instead of threshold-dependent ones in model evaluation.
